problem_names:
lemma majsI:
  "N div 2 < card S \<Longrightarrow> S \<in> majs"

lemma card_Compl:
  fixes S :: "('a :: finite) set"
  shows "card (-S) = card (UNIV :: 'a set) - card S"

lemma majorities_intersect:
  "card (Q :: process set) + card Q' > N \<Longrightarrow> Q \<inter> Q' \<noteq> {}"
translations:
locale quorum_process = quorum Quorum
  for Quorum :: "process set set"

locale mono_quorum = quorum_process +
  assumes mono_quorum: "\<lbrakk> Q \<in> Quorum; Q \<subseteq> Q' \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> Quorum"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>Q. Q \<in> Quorum
  \<lbrakk>?Q \<in> Quorum; ?Q \<subseteq> ?Q'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?Q' \<in> Quorum

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. UNIV \<in> Quorum

definition majs :: "(process set) set" where
  "majs \<equiv> {S. card S > N div 2}"

lemma majsI:
  "N div 2 < card S \<Longrightarrow> S \<in> majs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. N div 2 < card S \<Longrightarrow> S \<in> majs

lemma card_Compl:
  fixes S :: "('a :: finite) set"
  shows "card (-S) = card (UNIV :: 'a set) - card S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. card (- S) = card UNIV - card S

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. card (- S) = card UNIV - card S

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. card S + card (- S) = card UNIV

by(rule card_Un_disjoint[of S "-S", simplified Compl_partition, symmetric])
      (auto)

proof (state)
this:
  card S + card (- S) = card UNIV

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. card (- S) = card UNIV - card S

proof (prove)
using this:
  card S + card (- S) = card UNIV

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. card (- S) = card UNIV - card S

proof (state)
this:
  card (- S) = card UNIV - card S

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma majorities_intersect:
  "card (Q :: process set) + card Q' > N \<Longrightarrow> Q \<inter> Q' \<noteq> {}"
by (metis card_Un_disjoint card_mono finite not_le top_greatest)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q' \<in> majs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q \<inter> Q' \<noteq> {}
 2. \<exists>Q. Q \<in> majs
 3. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q' \<in> majs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q \<inter> Q' \<noteq> {}
 2. \<exists>Q. Q \<in> majs
 3. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs

proof (state)
this:
  Q \<in> majs
  Q' \<in> majs

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q' \<in> majs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q \<inter> Q' \<noteq> {}
 2. \<exists>Q. Q \<in> majs
 3. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs

proof (state)
this:
  Q \<inter> Q' \<noteq> {}

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<exists>Q. Q \<in> majs
 2. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<exists>Q. Q \<in> majs
 2. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs
apply(auto simp add: majs_def intro!: div_less_dividend finite_UNIV_card_ge_0)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>Q. Q \<in> majs

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs

proof (state)
this:
  Q \<in> majs
  Q \<subseteq> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q Q'.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<in> majs; Q \<subseteq> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Q' \<in> majs

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<in> majs
  Q \<subseteq> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q' \<in> majs

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<in> majs
  Q \<subseteq> Q'
  finite Q' \<Longrightarrow> card Q \<le> card Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q' \<in> majs

proof (state)
this:
  Q' \<in> majs

goal:
No subgoals!
